description:
Gavin Sevin is back for a few videos and I knew just who to put him with first!
You guys seem to really love Armani, and I can see why. He seems to throw himself into every shoot. He loves to suck dick, and of course, loves getting fucked. Armani is a gym guy, so putting him with another muscle dude really amps up his enthusiasm.
Gavin has gotten back into wrestling, and is even MMA fighting. He has to get down to about 150pds for his weight class, which I think is nuts, but I think after years of wrestling, shedding last minute weight doesn't seem so insurmountable. It just doesn't sounds like a healthy thing to do.
Gavin brings his 'A' game, and Armani gives it right back! The dude really loves riding a cock!
title: Armani & Gavin Sevin - RAW
